## Source: kam193 (daedaaf2f945a1cc86a93f479d8284153533d387ddd7b00418991a7998a37e11)
During installation, the package attempts to exfiltrate specific sensitive environment variables.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
